newsitem.title: MONACO: ATHLETICS-INJURED TORRENCE'S SEASON COULD BE OVER.
newsitem.headline: ATHLETICS-INJURED TORRENCE'S SEASON COULD BE OVER.

text.p: Gwen Torrence's season looked in danger of being brought to a premature end on Saturday after the former Olympic champion pulled a leg muscle during a 200 metres race at the Monaco grand prix.
The American veteran had to be carried from the track on a stretcher after hurting her left thigh in the last 100 metres of the sprint.
She was treated immediately at the track and did not need to go to hospital for further treatment.
